Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute near Roosevelt/Western
ShortDescription: #12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near Roosevelt/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near Roosevelt/Western.

Westbound buses will operate via Roosevelt, Damen, Taylor, Western, then resume their normal route on Roosevelt.

Eastbound buses will operate via Roosevelt, Western, Taylor, then resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
